intro1: I am a <1>full stack</1> web developer passionate about creating high-performance, scalable, and modern applications. I love building elegant frontend interfaces as much as designing robust backend APIs.
intro2: My favorite stack includes technologies like <1>React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, TypeScript, Express, MySQL</1>. I'm constantly learning, testing new tools, and improving my skills to deliver clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
